headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE; Commencement of the Campaign in Onde. Preparations for the Bombardment of Lucknow. DECLINE IN COTTON...BREADSTUFFS DULL. The King of Delhi Banished for Life to the Adaman Islands. Consols 96 3-4 a 97. IMPORTANT NEWS FROM INDIA. RUDIO'S SENTENCE COMMUTED. ARRIVAL OF THE CITY OF BALTIMORE. Reconciliation of France and England. Execution of Orsini and Pierri. The French Explanation Communicated to Parliament.

docs.lead_paragraph: The screw steamship City of Baltimore, which sailed from Liverpool on the morning of the 17th March, arrived at this port at an early hour yesterday morning.
docs.snippet: The screw steamship City of Baltimore, which sailed from Liverpool on the morning of the 17th March, arrived at this port at an early hour yesterday morning.

headline.main: Serious Illnese of Col. Benton--F. P. Blair, Esq.--Miscellaneous Notes at the Capital

docs.lead_paragraph: Col. BOSTON is about closing his long and evental career. He is almost the last of the old veterans the men who were in the height of their glory during the days of JACKSON, and who then made the whole country ring with the ccho of their contending follows. He has been confined to his room for the last few weeks.

headline.main: LATEST INTELLIGENCE; Trouble on the Lake Pepin Indian Reservation--A Separate Political District to Arizona-Jr. Critrenden's Substitute--Meeting of the Democratic Committee of Conference--Failure to Agree, &c. INTERESTING FROM WASHINGTON. By Telegraph to the New-York Times. Magnetic Telegraph Co.'s Offices - No. 43. Wall -st. and 181 Broadway.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. MONTGOMERY, of Pennsylvania, will introduce a bill extending preemption rights to settlers on the half-breed reservation bordering the Mississippi and Lake Pepin. There are eight thousand settlers on the land, which they have improved, and there is a conflict between them and the speculators, who bought Indian warrants and claim a right to locate on these lanes.

headline.main: ARRIVAL OF THE FULTON.; The New Programme for Laying the Submarine Cable. Important State Paper on the Refugee Question. INTERESTING FROM EUROPE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamship Fulton, from Havre and Southampton, arrived at this port yesterday morning. The Fulton was unable to leave Have until Thursday, March 11, 6 P. M., in consequence of there not being sufficient water in the docks, caused by the easterly gales blowing at that port for some time.

docs.lead_paragraph: Arrival of the Empire City--Capture of a Slaver by a British Cruser--Increase of Chinese Immigration to Havana--The Slave Trade--Business, The Empire City, Captain, S. P. GRIFFIN, from Havana on the 23 inst., arrived at this port yesterday morning.
docs.abstract: Capture of the Amelia off Cuba, by a Br. Cruiser
docs.snippet: Arrival of the Empire City--Capture of a Slaver by a British Cruser--Increase of Chinese Immigration to Havana--The Slave Trade--Business,  The Empire City, Captain, S. P. GRIFFIN, from Havana on the 23 inst., arrived at this port yesterday morning.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Staten Island Chronicle states that Dr. BISSELL, Physician of the Marine Hospital, has reconstructed and very much enlarged the Quarantine Light-house. The improvement was very much needed. While an increased intensity of light at Quarantine will thus be advantageous to commerce, it cannot help being of service in protecting the public health.
